Contact Me

Hi, it’s nice to meet you!

Pop me an email at hi@yasingenc.net or give me a shout on social media.

I might not tweet often but I’m always checking my timeline. Send a dm, a tweet, whatever works.

I’m also available for freelance front-end development projects.
